admin-menu.blog: Manage and edit blog posts, categories, and comments from the admin dashboard.
admin-menu.book: Administer book entries, categories, and other related settings for a book management system.
admin-menu.comment: Create and manage comments, including content, users, and submission settings.
admin-menu.email: Configure and oversee email communications and templates for newsletters and notifications.
admin-menu.experiences: Manage and update various user experiences and feedback collected through the platform.
admin-menu.links: Edit and organize important links and their categories for easy navigation and access.
admin-menu.media: Upload, organize, and manage all media files used throughout the website or application.
admin-menu.newsletter: Create and manage newsletters, including content, recipients, and distribution settings.
admin-menu.projects: Oversee and manage projects, including details, updates, and statuses from the admin interface.
admin-menu.subscriber: View and manage subscriber lists, preferences, and interactions for newsletters and updates.
admin-menu.technology: Manage technology-related settings, integrations, and updates for the website or application.
admin-menu.users: View, edit, and manage user accounts, roles, and permissions within the admin panel.

media-menu.about: View, add, and delete images for the gallery about me through the dashboard.

media-menu.projects: View, add, and delete pictures for projects through the dashboard.
media-menu.python: View, add, and delete images for the gallery Python through the dashboard.
media-menu.typescript: View, add, and delete images for the gallery TypeScript through the dashboard.
media-menu.vue: View, add, and delete images for the gallery Vue through the dashboard.
